title: Lucifers Pizza - Melrose
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Established in 2012, this is the 2nd Lucifers pizzeria; first one is in Los Feliz, LA. Caters to vegans by offering vegan crust and Daiya vegan cheese; has gluten-free crust. Choose your preferred degree of spicy, from mild to blazing. Cows recommend the zucha pizza vegan-style. Additional parking is provided in the rear of the building.
